replies.body: Considering Neeko has more boob than Jinx does (without transforming), I would say Jinx is flat.
It's a good defense mechanism to prevent people to get attracted to underage girl.

>Jinx is approximately - to use a reference you guys all know - Viâ€™s age. Maybe a little bit older, despite acting and looking significantly younger. She's a youthful, fun-loving personality, and I think she'll always be that no matter how old she gets. I can't even imagine grown-up Jinx.

Quote from RiotRansom circa 2013. If she's just a bit older than Vi, that'd put her somewhere between 19-21 years old.
Yeah, like I said, roughly Lux's age.
No, she's roughly Lux's age.
